Articles.Content:
So i want to rotate a part that is in persistence. My ladder is clipping through panels and i cant get back up. How do i do it? Here is a picture.

Edited June 7, 2013 by bigpapabearxx

I don't think you can edit a ship that' out of the VAB for what concerns part placement, even going in the persistence and quicksave files.

However, are you on the Mun? you could simply jump back up?
Sorry, bad angle. think further, like Laythe further.

Sorry, bad angle. think further, like Laythe further.

Aw crap well at least you have oxygen and "totally non radioactive Laythe water", you could start a company there and send "Laythe Death Spring Water" back to kerbin
Well i figured out how to get them back in. I use the rovers i set with it as like a stepping stool. Anyway, they are never coming back. *silently chuckles*

The way I am experimenting is a bit more complex. I remake the module and park it in it's landed configuration on Kerbal, then I change it's location to the one that the current lander is at. Lastly, delete the old lander.
